message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and I'm open to discussing the price further if you have any concerns.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my bottom line for this product is closer to my original asking price.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $11,750. Can you consider this offer?
